name: catzzel
description:
This is just a start for a huge puzzle game coming soon, in this prototype there are 3 type of puzzles while the one that I'm making have 20 different types, and there are funny stories in chapters, there are new cats like hairy pawtter, yes there are a lot of puns

You support are appreciated and we'll help me to create more and more

And please give me feedback after playing the game
